system.description: The user and allies within range have +1 default ACC. When using V-Create, the user can spend an additional 2 PP to add the [Crit 2] trait to the attack. When rolling to increase Luck at the end of a session, the user rolls a d10 twice and keeps the better result. If the user is an owned Pokemon, the Trainer gets an additional d6 roll for Luck instead.
